attributes.action: make all none british citizans have medical insurance before treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The N.H.S is spending money it has not got on people from other countries coming over to this country and using the N.H.S to get free treatment.These people have not paid into this and should not be allowed to have treatment without paying for it. When brits go abroad the first thing we get asked is for any insurance cover. If we did this we would have more money to spend on our own people.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
